name: Wonderful Da Nang and Hoi An in just one day!
description: Da Nang is the beautiful city which has other various interesting attractions stretching on dozens of kilometers...and good specialties. Hoi An is the ancient and peaceful town which is one of the most popular destinations in Vietnam that caters to travellers of all tastes and across the continents. Choosing this tour you can experience to attractions of my city - one of 6 amazing beaches in the world. Beside, you also enjoy the ancient definition of Hoi An Town. In just one day, you not only enjoy the combined beauty of  beach, mountain, river, ancient  World Heritage Site but also have a chance to taste delicious specialties like My Quang, Cao Lau, Banh Beo… Come and enjoy !!!!
